subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. is returning to racing at Martinsville Speedway on Sunday after a nearly three-week absence caused by a crash at Talladega on Oct. 7.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. is returning to racing at Martinsville Speedway on Sunday after a nearly three-week absence caused by a crash at Talladega on Oct. 7.
